name: mulgt0ii

stmt.origin: mp2an(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))

body.origin:

|- wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))

comment: The product of two positive numbers is positive. (Contributed by NM, 18-May-1999.)
